sentence: 'America's incompetent right now,' said TV host Ben Ferguson as he warned that adversaries were taking advantage +19 View gallery Former President Trump called into Fox News on Wednesday to claim the attack would not have happened on his watch Rep Scott Perry was among the Republicans who took to Twitter to blast Biden for Putin's aggression in Ukraine Others warned that America's allies were watching what was unfolding and see American weakness on the world stage +19 View gallery A steady stream of Republicans tweeted their anger at Biden and warned that the country's enemies would be watching.
author: Morgan Phillips
title: Republicans criticize Biden for admitting he 'knew' about Russia's invasion of Ukraine for months but still 'did nothing' and not sanctioning Putin personally is a 'big mistake'

sentence: 'America's incompetent right now,' said TV host Ben Ferguson as he warned that adversaries were taking advantage +19 View gallery Former President Trump called into Fox News on Wednesday to claim the attack would not have happened on his watch Rep Scott Perry was among the Republicans who took to Twitter to blast Biden for Putin's aggression in Ukraine Others warned that America's allies were watching what was unfolding and see American weakness on the world stage +19 View gallery A steady stream of Republicans tweeted their anger at Biden and warned that the country's enemies would be watching.
author: Morgan Phillips
title: Republicans criticize Biden for admitting he 'knew' about Russia's invasion of Ukraine for months but still 'did nothing' and not sanctioning Putin personally is a 'big mistake'

sentence: Freedom Caucus Chairman Rep. Scott Perry (R-PA) said he plans to speak to Cawthorn in the near future about his allegations, the lawmaker explained to Politico.
author: Julian Conradson
title: House Freedom Caucus Members Want Madison Cawthorn to “Name Names” After Explosive DC Swamp Coke, Orgy Claims
